Title: Buy A Fish A Brewery?
Description:
All right, $n, in order to continue my vishions, I must now have my own brewery.

...

Just kidding! You should have sheen your own face! Hilarioush... hic!

Anyway, I heard of a new drink that is unlike any other, and I would like a tashte.

Have you heard of the Mad Brewer'sh Breakfasht? If you can bring me some of thish shtuff, you will be my friend for life.
ObjectivesText: Bring 20 Mad Brewer's Breakfast to Jogu the Drunk. Mad Brewer's Breakfasts can be made using the cooking profession.
